rows.label: qst720301_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, here's the campsite at Seigle Fell.
Now, about that boy...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0002
rows.name: Hey, isn't that him?!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0003
rows.name: ...Whoa!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0004
rows.name: Hey! Wait! We won't hurt you!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0005
rows.name: We mean you no harm! Please, stay!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0006
rows.name: You... You won't hurt me?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0007
rows.name:
I see you've decided to trust us,
for now at least...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0008
rows.name:
We're affiliated with the Superbian
forces. We didn't come to bring
you mischief.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0009
rows.name:
We know what happened to Torigo,
and have been acting wholeheartedly
to protect the refugees.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0010
rows.name:
You've escaped from Torigo too,
perhaps?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0011
rows.name: T-that's right.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0012
rows.name: Can you tell us your name?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0013
rows.name: It's...Kai.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0014
rows.name:
Young Kai... Do you know Lasqam
Cove? The boat of my countrymen
is moored there.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0015
rows.name:
I know it! I know the boat too.
It's huge!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0016
rows.name:
Will you journey with us, young man?
We can also offer a hot meal.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0018
rows.name:
What's wrong? You don't want to
get on the boat?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0019
rows.name: No, it's not that...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0020
rows.name: It's... I've lost Kei, I mean, my...sister...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0021
rows.name: I... I have to find her!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0022
rows.name:
That's important stuff, kid. Why didn't
you tell us right away?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0023
rows.name:
I tell you what. You run ahead to
Lasqam Cove and wait by the boat.
We'll find your sister for you.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0024
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Well I never...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0025
rows.name:
We promise you that, Kai.
We'll find her for you.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0026
rows.name: C-can I really trust you...?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0027
rows.name: Yeah, course!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0028
rows.name:
Any idea where we might find this
sister of yours?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0029
rows.name:
Actually, she likes watching the big
boats at Lasqam Cove.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0030
rows.name:
So maybe she'll be somewhere you
can see them all coming and going.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0031
rows.name:
Then perhaps we should begin at a
high-up place that overlooks the cove.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0032
rows.name:
OK, I'll wait at the harbor...
But please find my sister!
